LanguageData.ATR_SkyMindConnectionFailed: Could not establish SkyMind connection. Check network capacity and availability.
LanguageData.ATR_SkyMindConnectionFailedNoNetwork: Could not establish SkyMind connection. There is no network available.
LanguageData.ATR_GridlockerCleared: The Grid-locker has successfully been decrypted and disabled.
LanguageData.ATR_RemoveCloudPawnSuccess: The neural network of {0} has been removed.
LanguageData.ATR_ReplicateCloudPawnFailed: Could not initiate replication. Insufficient SkyMind space available for allocation.
LanguageData.ATR_HackOperationFailed: The operation failed to breach the target faction's security system. No reprecussions are anticipated.
LanguageData.ATR_DisruptorHackSuccess: Disruption successful. Hostile units have been impaired.
LanguageData.ATR_NoArrival: Nothing was sent to the mixed up coordinates before the faction reset their guidance system. They got lucky, this time.
LanguageData.ATR_NewbootAndroidCreated: Android created. Install an interface via surgery to bring the unit online.
LanguageData.ATR_InterfaceRemoved: An android's interface was removed. All personality and control data has been destroyed. Install a new interface to bring it online.
LanguageData.ATR_CannotConnect: Attempted connection could not be established, ensure adequate network capacity and target viability.
LanguageData.ATR_OperationInitiated: SkyMind network link established by {0}'s request. Do not disable network connection until procedure is complete.
LanguageData.ATR_OperationCompletedDesc: The SkyMind network has successfully carried out the operation as requested by {0}.
LanguageData.ATR_OperationFailureDesc: {0} suffered a catastrophic memory corruption due to the collapse of the SkyMind link during a mind operation. The operation failed and severe damage to memory has occurred.
